definition: Lake Baiyangdian
surname Bai

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
ocean/vast/foreign/silver dollar or coin
sediment/precipitate
shallow water

sentences.english: The calculation shows that the Baiyangdian Lake has an regulative and progressive effect on the local climate.
sentences.chinese: 计算表明，白洋淀对局地气候有调节和改良作用。

sentences.english: Luckily, these young women grow up in Baiyang lake.
sentences.chinese: 幸亏这些年轻妇女，白洋淀长大的。

sentences.english: The Baiyangdian wetland is the biggest freshwater lake in North China.
sentences.chinese: 白洋淀湿地是华北地区最大的淡水湖泊。

sentences.english: Now we are coming to the leisure island. It is an ideal place for entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛就是休闲岛，是白洋淀的休闲娱乐景区。
